subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Perhaps {{der|zh|sit}}: {{cog|cdm|||to plant|tr=tuŋʔ-}}, {{m|cdm|दुङ्‌||shoot; sprout|tr=duŋ}}, {{m|cdm|दुङ्‌सा||to sprout; to grow|tr=duŋ-}}. Compare {{och-l|腫|to swell}} and {{och-l|踵|heel}}.

Related to {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*k-coːŋʔ||seed}} ({{cog|vi|giống||seed}}), which is likely a loanword from Chinese ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1948}}).
